testing.action: Create and run test cases to verify the functionality of the newly implemented methods, metadata schema, and signals. Ensure that all edge cases are covered and that the model behaves as expected.

documentation.action: Revise the model's documentation to reflect the changes made. Include detailed descriptions of the new methods, metadata schema, and signals, along with usage examples.

integration.action: Examine other models and components that interact with the `SchoolYear` model to ensure compatibility and consistency. Make necessary adjustments to maintain integration.

refactoring.action: Review the codebase for opportunities to refactor and improve maintainability. This may include optimizing queries, improving code readability, and ensuring adherence to coding standards.

deployment.action: Ensure that all changes are tested and documented before deploying to production. Coordinate with the deployment team to schedule and execute the deployment process.
